titles.title: To revive and extend until January 1, 1996, the suspension of duty on norfloxacin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1-ethyl-6-fluoro-1,4-dihydro-4-oxo-7-(1-piperazinyl)-3- quinolinecarboxylic acid (also known as norfloxacin).
